original: ANDERSSON, Oscar, Fabrikör, Kinna, f Okonie, Hall l, 10/2 82 av byggm Anders Persson o h h, gm Jenny Andersson. Inneh Oscar Anderssons Sko- & Toffelfabr, Kinna. Led av municipalflm, tax.nmdn, byggn.nmdn, badhusstyr, folksk.styr o beredn.utsk, ordf i polisnmdn. Hobby: Antikviteter. Oscar Anderssons Sko- & Toffelfabr bör j fabr.mässig tillverkn av trätofflor 07 o tillverkar sed. 30 främst skodon.
translated: ANDERSSON, Oscar, Manufacturer, Kinna, born in Okonie, Halland county, on February 10th, 1882, son of construction worker Anders Persson and his wife. Married to Jenny Andersson. Owner of Oscar Andersson's Shoe and Slipper Factory in Kinna. Served on the municipal board, tax committee, building committee, swimming pool board, school board, and preparatory committee. Chairman of the police committee. Hobby: Antiques. Oscar Andersson's Shoe and Slipper Factory started producing wooden slippers in 1907 and has been primarily manufacturing footwear since 1930.

structured.name: Oscar Andersson

worksFor.name: Oscar Andersson's Shoe and Slipper Factory

structured.description: Oscar Andersson was born on February 10th, 1882 in Okonie, Halland county. He is the son of Anders Persson, a construction worker, and his wife. He is married to Jenny Andersson. Oscar is a manufacturer and resides in Kinna. He is the owner of Oscar Andersson's Shoe and Slipper Factory where wooden slippers were first produced in 1907 before primarily manufacturing footwear since 1930. In addition to his business, Oscar is actively involved in various committees and boards, including the municipal board, tax committee, building committee, swimming pool board, school board, and preparatory committee. He also serves as the chairman of the police committee. Oscar's hobby is collecting antiques.

career.workplace: Oscar Andersson's Shoe and Slipper Factory
